title: Tribunal Gone for Good?
body:
I'm not sure if anyone even remembers this system. Giving the community a way to punish those who are detrimental to the game seemed to be working. It also took a part of the work load off of Riot's back. Is this still up or has it gotten buried under all of the other paperwork collecting dust somewhere?

If it's still up or in the works, somebody please let me know.

replies.body: It's been gone for a long time. It's not coming back, mostly because it was really slow.

To add on to this; the Tribunal has been replaced by the Instant Feedback System (IFS), which does the same workload as the Tribunal, only automatically and with greater speed and efficiency - which is necessary, considering how massively the community has exploded since those 4-5~ years when the Tribunal was iceboxed.

If you haven't read, this was the latest article about the tribunal.

https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2018/08/ask-riot-will-tribunal-return/
No, it didn't work. It took months for people to get punished after the bad behavior occurred.
